intent.user_query: Calculate the customer lifetime value (simple calculation: average order value * number of orders).

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT c.CustomerID, AVG(s.TotalAmount) * COUNT(s.SaleID) AS CustomerLifetimeValue FROM fitness_db.Customers c JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON c.CustomerID = s.CustomerID GROUP BY c.CustomerID;

arguments.sql: SELECT c.CustomerID, AVG(s.TotalAmount) * COUNT(s.SaleID) AS CustomerLifetimeValue FROM fitness_db.Customers c JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON c.CustomerID = s.CustomerID GROUP BY c.CustomerID;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
